profile:
We are a leading company that specializes in Shower Restoration Services and Tile and Grout Cleaning and Repairing

Over time grout surrounding tiles might crack or soften allowing moisture and bacteria to penetrate causing mold, mildew and water problems to occur. 

MOLD, DISCOLOURED GROUT, LOOSE TILES, AND PEALING CAULK/SILICONE are signs that you can't ignore and we are here to help you!

Our Restoration Services will help you avoid future water damage problems and leave your Shower looking brand new again for a fraction of the cost of a full bathroom renovation! 

Email us: fgstileandgrout@gmail.com

You can also find us on 
Facebook: fb.me/tileandgroutFGS
Instagram: fgstileandgrout

profile: Grout Repair.Ca has been servicing The Greater Toronto Area (GTA) for 11 years providing quality shower restoration, re-grouting, grout repair, grout re-coloring, tiles repair, tiles and grout cleaning and caulking service. We offer quality work, quality material, excellent craftsmanship and value for your money. We take the time to get the job done right the first time or we will return to fix it until you are totally satisfied. At Grout Repair.ca, a large part of our business is from clients who return for more excellent work or from happy clients who refer us to their friends and family. Customer Satisfaction is not just a phrase but it what we accomplish time and time again. You can count on us to be punctual and respectful of your time and home. Before we commence work in your home we take the time to protect areas that will be affected by covering up all affected areas and when the job is completed we will clean up thoroughly. Your home is your castle and we keep it that way.

profile:
Welcome to From Dark To Light Carpet & Upholstery Care. 

We are two friends reunited in Canada, and we decided to start our own cleaning business. 
Our service is combination of Eco-friendly products, knowledgeable and experience technicians, most updated equipment, strict procedures and love for what we do. 

Cleaning procedures are: vacuuming, pre spraying, agitation, hot water extraction and buffing. Disinfection and scotch guard protection are always an option. 
Don’t let your carpet or upholstery to be a breeding ground for germs and bacteria or allergens. Clean carpets and upholstery make your environment healthier.  

When it comes to pet enzyme decontamination we are experts. We can solve even the most severe pet urine accidents.  

We take a pride in the work we do, and we guarantee you'll love the results of our carpet and upholstery cleaning service!

Our Business Hours: 8:00 am until 9:00 pm, 7 days a week 

Available for Emergency stains and carpet cleaning as well.

*** Covid 19 Update: We will be wearing PPE and practicing social distancing while attending the appointments ***

profile:
Shower Restoration of Toronto is committed to delivering outstanding customer service. Not only does the owner meet directly with each client to provide a free estimate, but he also returns directly to the site to complete the work himself.

We're a small local family run business which began operations in the early 2000's in Toronto, Ontario where we completed extensive training in the marble restoration industry. Our first work experience was varied and included large scale commercial marble repairs. Our customers were so impressed with our service, that when it came time to refinish or restore their bathrooms, they naturally turned to us.

We pride ourselves in continuing to deliver outstanding results in shower renovations.

Providing exceptional customer service in our hallmark. We respond to every inquiry as though you are the only client.
